message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I believe a price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you think?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $12,000. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $13,000. How about we try $12,500? I'm willing to compromise, but I want to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
